# isReadOnly()

**Instance Method**

Returns whether a record is read-only.

## Declaration

```swift
func isReadOnly() -> Bool
```

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the record is read-only; otherwise, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].
title: isReadOnly()
